Function reference

Main

These are the primary functions of ffsimulator.

ff_simulate()
Simulate Fantasy Seasons
autoplot.ff_simulation() plot(<ff_simulation>)
Automatically Plot ff_simulation Object
ff_simulate_week()
Simulate Fantasy Week
autoplot.ff_simulation_week() plot(<ff_simulation_week>)
Automatically Plot ff_simulation Object
ff_wins_added()
Wins Added
ffs_copy_template()
Copy simulation template to filename

Customized Simulations

Subfunctions used by ff_simulate

ffs_adp_outcomes()
Connects ff_scoringhistory to past ADP rankings
ffs_adp_outcomes_week()
Connects ff_scoringhistory to past ADP rankings
ffs_latest_rankings()
Download latest rankings from DynastyProcess GitHub
ffs_starter_positions()
Get league starter positions
ffs_franchises()
Get Franchises
ffs_rosters()
Get Rosters
ffs_generate_projections()
Generate Projections
ffs_generate_projections_week()
Generate Projections
ffs_add_replacement_level()
Add replacement level players to each roster
ffs_score_rosters()
Join Rosters to Projected Scores
ffs_optimise_lineups() ffs_optimize_lineups()
Optimise Lineups
ffs_build_schedules()
Generate fantasy schedules
ffs_schedule()
Get Schedule
ffs_repeat_schedules()
Repeat fantasy schedules
ffs_summarise_week() ffs_summarise_season() ffs_summarise_simulation() ffs_summarise_inseason() ffs_summarize_week() ffs_summarize_season() ffs_summarize_simulation()
Summarise simulation outputs

ffscrapr Imports

Functions imported from ffscrapr

espn_connect
Connect to a league
ff_connect
Connect to a league
ff_scoringhistory
Get league scoring history
ff_starter_positions
Get league starter positions
fleaflicker_connect
Connect to a league
mfl_connect
Connect to a league
sleeper_connect
Connect to a league

Miscellaneous

Additional helper functions and data

`%>%`
Pipe operator
fp_rankings_history
Historical draft position ranks
fp_injury_table
FP injury table
fp_rankings_history_week
Historical position ranks
